snippet.title: Politeness Has Risen! - Full Gameplay of Mega64's First Video Game, Doug Huggem
snippet.description:
Today, one of the biggest game launches 13 years in the making has happened. Afrer many years of waiting, Mega64 has finally launched their first video game, Doug Huggem, to the public! The game has you playing as a good samaritan named Doug Huggem, the complete opposite of Duke Nukem, and has you going around doing good deeds to build up your positivity meter. The more good things you do, the more your meter rises.

As someone who was looking forward to the release, I have made sure that this was a game I was gonna play today. Everyone could use a good ol' Christian side hug! It's the Doug Huggem thing to do, the right thing!

I hope you enjoy watching this gameplay of Doug Huggem!

Play the game online: mega64.com/doughuggem
Download the game: getbonus.itch.io/doughuggem
Watch the original announcement video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6YGu4zQgTvg
